allow: Bash(do echo "=== $backup ===" ls -la "/Volumes/Garden/TerrAI Backups and Optimization Files/BACKUPS:OPTIMIZATIONS/Legacy Backups/$backup/")

Bash(do path="/Volumes/Garden/TerrAI Backups and Optimization Files/BACKUPS:OPTIMIZATIONS/Legacy Backups/$backup/Source/TerrAI" echo "=== $backup ===" ls -lh "$path/WaterSystem.cpp" "$path/MasterController.cpp" "$path/TerrainController.cpp")
